headline: BofA Sees Long-Term Upside in Coinbase Global (COIN) Despite Near-Term Crypto Volatility
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. (NASDAQ:COIN) is among the best debt-free stocks to buy now, with renewed analyst optimism after a recent sharp pullback. According to a January 8 report from The Fly, BofA upgraded the stock’s rating to Buy from Neutral and maintained its price target of $340. While BofA acknowledged the 40% decline in the stock since […]

headline: Assessing Bank of America (BAC) Valuation After Recent Choppy Share Price Performance
summary: Why Bank of America Stock Is on Investor Watch Bank of America (BAC) is back on many investors’ screens after recent share price moves. The stock closed at $52.97 and has shown mixed performance over the past week, month, and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Bank of America. Recent trading has been choppy. The 1 day share price return was 0.72%, compared with a 7 day share price return that declined by 5.16%. Over a longer period, the 1 year total shareholder return of 16.48% and...
